DOC.brief_summary: This study will demonstrate the definitive bioequivalence of a solid dose formulation of MK0974 to the liquid filled capsule formulation of MK0974.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence of the Tablet and Liquid-Filled Capsule Forms of MK0974 (0974-042)
DOC.criteria: Subject is in good health Subject is a nonsmoker Subject is willing to comply with the study restrictions Subject has history of stroke, chronic seizures, or any major neurological disorder Subject has a history of cancer Subject is a nursing mother Subject has uncontrolled high blood pressure Subject has or has a history of any disease or condition that might made participation in the study unsafe or confound the study results
